name: College of Whispers
description: Bards of the College of Whispers manipulate fear and secrets, using psychological terror and stolen identities to dismantle foes from within.

3.name: Psychic Blades
3.description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend one use of Bardic Inspiration to deal extra psychic damage to the target.

3.name: Words of Terror
3.description: If you speak with a humanoid alone for at least 1 minute, you can instill fear in it, causing it to be frightened of you for a duration.

6.name: Mantle of Whispers
6.description: When a humanoid dies within 30 feet of you, you can capture its shadow and magically assume its appearance and memories for a time.

14.name: Shadow Lore
14.description: As an action, you whisper a dark secret that psychically binds a creature, charming and frightening it for a duration.
